mapper.insert: insert into collect_box_flow_info (version, status, operate_type, create_time, update_time, yn) values (#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{operateType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, now(), now(), 1)
mapper.update:
update collect_box_flow_info set
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, yn = #{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ts = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, version, status, operate_type, create_time, update_time, yn, ts from collect_box_flow_info
select id, version, create_time, status from collect_box_flow_info where yn = 1 and version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update collect_box_flow_info
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
